answerText: pi bond[10] Consider the carbon atom on one side of a double bond. What is the angle between the two single bonds attached to the carbon?

question: Question: One nodal plane passes through two nuclei connected by one of these bonds. For 10 points each: [10] Name this type of bond that is formed from the overlap of two p orbitals. Along with one sigma bond, two of these bonds make up a triple bond.
